Text: Downloaded this and found the subtitles lagged the voice by several seconds.  Otherwise, the video and audio were very good.
yes i have the same problem as rob2042

agreed, good A/V but subtitles way off

Since its hardcoded I don't think you can fix it either :/

Just finished watching.  Skip this version if you need English subs as these hardcoded ones are an entire scene off. 
So you are watching a new scene when the subs from the last scene start arriving.  Try paying attention to storyline subs from 3 minutes ago while watching a new action scene... 
Movies pretty good tho on a side note if you like the Ip Man series.
